GEOGRAPHIC AND LOCATION DATA

City: Charlotte
State: North Carolina
Zip Code: 28202

The property is positioned in Charlotte's vibrant Southend neighborhood, known for walkable streets, trendy restaurants, and upscale retail. The location offers urban convenience with proximity to entertainment, employment centers, and cultural institutions. Public transit options are available in the area.

The home features laminate and tile flooring throughout, with paint in neutral tones. The kitchen includes contemporary cabinetry and standard appliances. Date of Execution: November 9, 2025
Contract Number: REPSA-2025-7821

PARTIES TO THE AGREEMENT

This agreement is entered into between the Seller and the Buyer for the purchase and sale of the real property hereinafter described.

PROPERTY DESCRIPTION

The property subject to this agreement is located at 1635 Elmwood Drive, Portland, Oregon 97214, consisting of a single-family residential dwelling with the following specifications:

Building Status: SOLD - This property has been sold and this contract represents the completion of the transaction.

Physical Specifications:
- Number of Bedrooms: 4
- Number of Bathrooms: 2.5
- Living Area: 2,575 square feet
- Lot Size: 0.42 acres

Location Identification:
- City: Portland
- State: Oregon
- Zip Code: 97214

SALE PRICE AND TERMS

The Buyer agrees to purchase the above-described property for the total sum of $520,000 (Five Hundred Twenty Thousand Dollars). This represents the final negotiated price and includes all structures, improvements, and fixtures attached to the land.

PROPERTY CONDITION AND IMPROVEMENTS

The property is in good condition with recent updates including new interior paint, refinished hardwood floors throughout the main level, and upgraded bathroom fixtures. The home features a modern HVAC system installed in 2023, updated electrical systems, and plumbing in working order. The kitchen includes custom cabinetry and stainless steel appliances.

LOT AND GROUNDS

The property encompasses 0.42 acres of land with mature landscaping including oak and maple trees. A wraparound front porch and rear patio provide outdoor living spaces. The property includes a two-car detached garage with workshop storage.

LOCATION AND COMMUNITY BENEFITS

The property is located in Portland's sought-after Montavilla neighborhood, providing convenient access to local parks, restaurants, shopping, and schools. The area is characterized by established residential charm and strong community engagement. Public transportation is readily accessible, with bus lines serving the neighborhood.

TITLE AND CLOSING INFORMATION

The Seller warrants clear and marketable title to the above-described property. All inspections have been completed successfully. The transaction is scheduled for closing with full transfer of title and possession to the Buyer. All required documentation has been prepared and reviewed.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

This agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties regarding the purchase and sale of the aforementioned property. All terms and conditions have been negotiated in good faith. This contract is binding upon execution by both parties.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this agreement as of the date first written above.

PROPERTY CONDITION AND VALUE ASSESSMENT REPORT

Report Issued: November 9, 2025
Assessment ID: PCVA-2025-5634
Property Appraiser: Strategic Property Evaluations Inc.

INTRODUCTION AND PURPOSE

This comprehensive assessment evaluates a residential property in Charlotte, North Carolina that is currently available for sale. The appraisal was conducted to establish fair market value and verify property specifications for potential buyers and lending institutions.

SUBJECT PROPERTY IDENTIFICATION

Property Address: 5247 Oakmont Terrace, Charlotte, North Carolina 28202
Current Market Status: FOR SALE
Listing Price: $495,000

RESIDENTIAL SPECIFICATIONS

The subject property is a single-family residence with the following architectural and structural characteristics:

Bedroom Count: 3 bedrooms
Bathroom Count: 2 bathrooms
Total Square Footage: 2,340 square feet
Land Area: 0.55 acres

The residence was constructed in 2008 and represents mid-range quality residential construction. The floor plan features an efficient layout with open living areas and well-appointed bedrooms. Exterior construction includes brick veneer with vinyl siding and an asphalt composition roof.

GEOGRAPHIC AND LOCATION DATA

City: Charlotte
State: North Carolina
Zip Code: 28202
Neighborhood: Southend District

The property is positioned in Charlotte's vibrant Southend neighborhood, known for walkable streets, trendy restaurants, and upscale retail. The location offers urban convenience with proximity to entertainment, employment centers, and cultural institutions. Public transit options are available in the area.

INTERIOR AND EXTERIOR FEATURES

The home features laminate and tile flooring throughout, with paint in neutral tones. The kitchen includes contemporary cabinetry and standard appliances. Bathrooms are updated with modern fixtures and tile work. A mudroom area provides entry convenience. The property includes a one-car garage and driveway parking.

LOT CHARACTERISTICS AND IMPROVEMENTS

The property occupies 0.55 acres of landscaped lot with ornamental trees and shrubs. A deck extends from the rear of the home, offering outdoor living space. Drainage and grading appear adequate, with no observed surface water issues. The lot is level and suitable for the current residential use.

MECHANICAL SYSTEMS ASSESSMENT

The HVAC system was updated in 2022 with a new furnace and air conditioning unit. Electrical systems support modern usage with updated panel. Plumbing infrastructure is functional with copper lines throughout. The roof inspection reveals no major defects, with an estimated remaining life of 8-10 years.

MARKET ANALYSIS AND VALUATION

Based on comparable sales analysis and current market conditions, the asking price of $495,000 is reasonable and competitive for the Charlotte market. The property appeals to first-time homebuyers and young professionals seeking accessible urban living. Market demand in this area remains strong.

CONCLUSION

The subject property presents as a sound residential investment with good bones and favorable location characteristics. The property is well-suited for owner-occupancy in Charlotte's dynamic real estate environment.
